channel.title: I need some help :) putting my server online again
channel.description:
hi guys :) erm.. this post can be long but i dont now :) ill start off :)
i had a server online for like 3 years ago.. now i forgot how :S i have the no-ip. running .. and the www.no-ip.com running .. and my source running ... and then i checked the google status checker .. and it's still offline :S
i havent been able to host a server since i moved :S
i hope some of you guys would be that nice to help me :)
i really want to host again :)
edit : ive just portforwarded .... but still ... offline :S

item.title: I need some help :) putting my server online again
item.dc:creator: @klump klump
item.description:
@klump wrote:

how the f do i enable port in firewall ? :S btw i didnt think i did that 3years ago :S ?

Read full topic
item.source: I need some help :) putting my server online again

item.title: I need some help :) putting my server online again
item.dc:creator: @Chaotic-land Chaotic-land
item.description:
@Chaotic-land wrote:

@ Did you enable the port in the firewall?
@ Did you put in the right ipv4 in your router portforward
@ Did you enable the port in Port Forwarding
@ If you think you did something wrong, go to www.portforward.com and you will see guides there.

Read full topic
item.source: I need some help :) putting my server online again
